LanguageData.MakeComponents_Hand.label: 组装零部件
LanguageData.MakeComponents_Hand.description: Assembles components from metal. Quite slow. \n\n产出：12。
LanguageData.MakeAdvancedComponent.label: Assemble components
LanguageData.MakeAdvancedComponent.description: Assemble components from metal. Quite fast. \n\n产出：24。
LanguageData.MakeWires_Hand.label: 制作电线
LanguageData.MakeWires_Hand.description: 制造 wires from high conductivity metals. Quite slow. \n\n产出：20。
LanguageData.MakeWires_Electric.label: 制作电线
LanguageData.MakeWires_Electric.description: 制造 wires from high conductivity metals. Quite fast. \n\n产出：40。
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand.label: 将碎石碾磨成沙子
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand.description: Crush rubble to obtain sand. Quite slow. \n\n产出：25。
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric.label: 将碎石碾磨成沙子
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric.description: Crush rubble to obtain sand. Quite fast. \n\n产出：50。
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand_Chunk.label: 将石块碾磨成沙子
LanguageData.MakeSand_Hand_Chunk.description: Obtain sand by pulverizing a chunk of stone. Quite slow. \n\n产出：80。
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric_Chunk.label: 将石块碾磨成沙子
LanguageData.MakeSand_Electric_Chunk.description: Obtain sand by pulverizing a chunk of stone. Quite fast. \n\n产出：80。
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand.label: 将石砖碾磨成碎石
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand.description: Crush stone blocks into rubble. Quite slow. \n\n产出：20。
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric.label: 将石砖碾磨成碎石
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric.description: Crush stone blocks into rubble. Quite fast. \n\n产出：40。
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand_Chunk.label: 将石块碾磨成碎石
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Hand_Chunk.description: Crush stone chunks into rubble. Quite slow. \n\n产出：32。
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric_Chunk.label: 将石块碾磨成碎石
LanguageData.MakeCrushedStone_Electric_Chunk.descript: Crush stone chunks into rubble. Quite slow. \n\n产出：32。
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Hand.label: 制作钢筋混凝土
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Hand.description: Create reinforced concrete from concrete and metal. Quite slow. \n\n产出：8。
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Electric.label: 制作钢筋混凝土
LanguageData.MakeReinforcedConcrete_Electric.descript: Create reinforced concrete from concrete and metal. Quite fast. \n\n产出：16。
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Hand.label: 组装机械组件
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Hand.description: Assemble mechanisms. Mechanisms are simple gear-like parts for use in machines or workbenches. Quite slow. \n\n产出：5。
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Electric.label: 组装机械组件
LanguageData.MakeSimpleMechanism_Electric.description: Assemble mechanisms. Mechanisms are simple gear-like parts for use in machines or workbenches. Quite fast. \n\n产出：10。
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Hand.label: 组装先进机械组件
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Hand.description: Assemble advanced mechanisms. Advanced mechanisms are intricate gear-like parts for use in complex machines or workbenches. Quite slow. \n\n产出：5。
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Electric.label: 组装先进机械组件
LanguageData.MakeAdvMechanism_Electric.description: Assemble advanced mechanisms. Advanced mechanisms are intricate gear-like parts for use in complex machines or workbenches. Quite fast. \n\n产出：10。
LanguageData.MakeMetalCan.label: 制作金属罐
LanguageData.MakeMetalCan.description: 制造 cans from metal. Cans are typically used to preserve food when there are no freezers nearby. \n\n产出：10。
LanguageData.MakeMendingKit.label: 制作修理包
LanguageData.MakeMendingKit.description: 制造 mending kits from various materials. \n\n产出：enough to re-stock the mending table。
